description:
The Black Diamond Wall Hauler 140 Haul Bag is designed for big wall climbing and long expeditions, with a large capacity, a durable material, and a comfortable carry system. Whether you are heading to Yosemite, Patagonia, or the Himalayas, this bag will be your faithful companion on the wall.

  • It is made from highly durable TPU-coated body materials that can resist abrasion, puncture, and water
  • The bag has a roll-top closure with an over-the-top compression strap that secures your gear and prevents it from spilling out
  • It has an exterior access pocket for small items that you need to reach quickly
  • The updated carry system is ergonomically designed with S-shaped shoulder straps, a padded back panel, and a waist belt. The carry system can be easily tucked away when not in use
  • The bag also has off-set handles that make it easier to grab and lift. The rim of the bag has been redesigned to reduce snagging when hauling, and the bag comes with a haul loop and a haul tag line
  • The Wall Hauler 140 Haul Bag is a versatile and reliable bag that can accommodate all your gear and supplies for multi-day climbs and expeditions
name: Black Diamond Wall Hauler 140 Haul Bag
